content: Hey Lakshmi! Thanks so much for reading my article, and for your thoughtful response. I couldn’t agree more with you, and I’m glad you enjoyed “12 Reasons Why Being a Woman is Completely Amazing,” and took it for the lighthearted take on #IWD that I intended it to be. While I know there’s still work to be done, I think it’s also really important to simply celebrate womanhood! We sooooo rock! xo
